00028 GrMeshCombiner::GrMeshCombiner( unsigned int maxIndexCount, unsigned int maxVertexCount )
00029 : _vertexCount( 0 )
00030 , _indexCount( 0 )
00031 , _maxVertexCount( maxVertexCount )
00032 , _maxIndexCount( maxIndexCount )

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------
00049 bool
00050 GrMeshCombiner::CanAddMesh( const GrMeshInst* meshInst )
00051 {
00053         B_ASSERT( meshInst->GetMesh()->GetIndexData() );
00054 
00056         if ( _meshInsts.size() == 0 )
00057                 return true;
00058 
00060         if ( ( _vertexCount + meshInst->GetMesh()->GetVertexCount() ) > _maxVertexCount )
00061                 return false;
00062 
00064         if ( ( _indexCount + meshInst->GetMesh()->GetIndexCount() ) > _maxIndexCount )
00065                 return false;
00066 
00068         if ( meshInst->GetMesh()->GetUberTexture() != _uberTexture )
00069                 return false;
00070 
00072         unsigned int groupComponents = _meshInsts[ 0 ]->GetMesh()->GetVertexData()->GetUsedComponents();
00073         unsigned int meshComponents = meshInst->GetMesh()->GetVertexData()->GetUsedComponents();
00074 
00076         return meshComponents == groupComponents;
00077 }
00078 
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------
00080 unsigned int
00081 GrMeshCombiner::AddMesh( const GrMeshInst* meshInst )
00082 {
00084         B_ASSERT( meshInst != 0 );
00085 
00087         unsigned int retVal = ( unsigned int )_ranges.size();
00088 
00090         GrMesh* curMesh = meshInst->GetMesh();
00091 
00092         if ( _meshInsts.size() == 0 )
00093                 _uberTexture = curMesh->GetUberTexture();
00094 
00096         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < curMesh->GetRangeCount(); ++i )
00097         {
00099                 const GrMesh::SRange& curRange = curMesh->GetRange( i );
00100 
00102                 GrMesh::SRange range = curRange;
00103                 range.minIndex += _vertexCount;
00104                 range.maxIndex += _vertexCount;
00105                 range.start += _indexCount;
00106 
00108                 _rangeMaterials.push_back( meshInst->GetMaterial( i ) );
00109 
00111                 _ranges.push_back( range );
00112         }
00113 
00114 #ifdef _DEBUG
00115         {
00117                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _meshInsts.size(); ++i )
00118                 {
00119                         B_ASSERT( _meshInsts[ i ] != meshInst );
00120                 }
00121         }
00122 #endif
00123 
00125         _meshInsts.push_back( meshInst );
00126         _vertexCount += curMesh->GetVertexCount();
00127         _indexCount += curMesh->GetIndexCount();
00128 
00130         B_ASSERT( _rangeMaterials.size() == _ranges.size() );
00131 
00133         return retVal;
00134 }

00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 GrMeshInst*
00138 GrMeshCombiner::BuildFinalMesh( const tstring& name )
00139 {
00141         if ( !_meshInsts.size() )
00142                 return 0;
00143 
00145         unsigned int vertexComponents = _meshInsts[ 0 ]->GetMesh()->GetVertexData()->GetUsedComponents();
00146 /*
00150         _ranges.resize( 1 );
00151         GrMesh::SRange& firstRange = _ranges.front();
00152         firstRange.minIndex = 0;
00153         firstRange.maxIndex = _vertexCount-1;
00154         firstRange.start = 0;
00155         firstRange.count = _indexCount;
00156 */
00158         URef< GrMesh > mesh = new GrMesh( name, vertexComponents, _vertexCount, _indexCount, &_ranges.front(),
00159                 ( unsigned int )_ranges.size(), false, false );
00160 
00162         GrMeshVB* dstVertexData = mesh->GetVertexData();
00163         GrMeshIB* dstIndexData = mesh->GetIndexData();
00164 
00166         unsigned int meshInstCount = ( unsigned int )_meshInsts.size();
00167         unsigned int indexOffset = 0;
00168         unsigned int vertexOffset = 0;
00169         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < meshInstCount; ++i )
00170         {
00172                 GrMeshVB* srcVertexData = _meshInsts[ i ]->GetMesh()->GetVertexData();
00173                 GrMeshIB* srcIndexData = _meshInsts[ i ]->GetMesh()->GetIndexData();
00174                 unsigned int srcVertexCount = srcVertexData->GetVertexCount();
00175                 unsigned int srcIndexCount = srcIndexData->GetIndexCount();
00176 
00178                 if ( dstVertexData->GetVertices() )
00179                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetVertices() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetVertices(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00180 
00181                 if ( dstVertexData->GetNormals() )
00182                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetNormals() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetNormals(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00183 
00184                 if ( dstVertexData->GetBiNormals() )
00185                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetBiNormals() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetBiNormals(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00186 
00187                 if ( dstVertexData->GetTangents() )
00188                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetTangents() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetTangents(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00189 
00190                 if ( dstVertexData->GetColors() )
00191                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetColors() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetColors(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( unsigned long ) );
00192 
00193                 if ( dstVertexData->GetTexCoords() )
00194                         MemCopy( dstVertexData->GetTexCoords() + vertexOffset, srcVertexData->GetTexCoords(), srcVertexCount * sizeof( SVec2 ) );
00195 
00197                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < srcIndexCount; ++j )
00198                 {
00199                         unsigned int curIdx = srcIndexData->GetIndices()[ j ] & 0xFFFF;
00200                         curIdx += vertexOffset;
00201                         dstIndexData->GetIndices()[ j + indexOffset ] = ( unsigned short )curIdx;
00202                 }
00203 
00205                 vertexOffset += srcVertexCount;
00206                 indexOffset += srcIndexCount;
00207         }
00208 
00209 #if 1
00211         {
00212                 unsigned int indexCount = 0;
00213                 unsigned int vertexCount = 0;
00214                 unsigned int rangeCount = 0;
00215                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _meshInsts.size(); ++i )
00216                 {
00217                         vertexCount += _meshInsts[ i ]->GetMesh()->GetVertexCount();
00218                         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < _meshInsts[ i ]->GetRangeCount(); ++j )
00219                         {
00220                                 B_ASSERT( _meshInsts[ i ]->GetMaterial( j ) == _rangeMaterials[ rangeCount ] );
00221                                 ++rangeCount;
00222                                 indexCount += _meshInsts[ i ]->GetMesh()->GetRange( j ).count;
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225                 B_ASSERT( rangeCount == _ranges.size() );
00226                 B_ASSERT( vertexCount == _vertexCount );
00227                 B_ASSERT( indexCount == _indexCount );
00228         }
00229 #endif
00230 
00231         dstVertexData->MarkAsDirty( ~0 );
00232         dstIndexData->MarkAsDirty();
00233         mesh->VertexDataChanged();
00234 
00236         B_ASSERT( vertexOffset == _vertexCount );
00237         B_ASSERT( indexOffset == _indexCount );
00238 
00240         return new GrMeshInst( mesh, &_rangeMaterials.front(), MMat4x4() );
00241 }
